network_overview: The capture shows a quiet LTE/EPC lab or maintenance window: only control-plane keep-alive (S1-AP, GTP-C) and internal DNS64/NAT64 bursts are present; every Diameter procedure (Cmd-318/316/324) is rejected with Result-Code 2001 (User unknown/IMSI not in HSS) and no user-plane GTP-U tunnels were created, so zero subscriber traffic passed.

observations.finding: 0 % success rate on all 64 Diameter exchanges (Cmd-318/316/324) with consistent 2001 cause
No GTP-U tunnels established despite GTP-C bearer attempts (6 pkt, 11 min)
Zero SIP/RTP/VoLTE flows; IMS layer completely silent

root_causes.issue: HSS rejecting all UEs as unknown
root_causes.description: Every Diameter Update-Location (318), Cancel-Location (316) and Purge-UE (324) receives Result-Code 2001, indicating the IMSI is not provisioned in the HSS or the MME is using a test IMSI range that the HSS does not recognise.
root_causes.impact: No subscriber can attach; consequently no GTP-U bearers, no VoLTE, no data service.

recommendations.action: Verify IMSI ranges in MME test-USIM cards and add matching subscriber profiles to HSS
recommendations.rationale: Eliminates the 2001 rejects and allows normal attach/GTP-U setup

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U capture filter and repeat test to confirm bearer creation once 2001 is cleared
recommendations.rationale: Validates that user-plane path is healthy after control-plane fix

recommendations.action: Lower Diameter watchdog timeout temporarily to speed up fail-fast during lab integration
recommendations.rationale: Reduces wait time when running automated regression suites

session_analysis.signaling_health: S1-AP and SCTP associations are stable (27 pkt, 11 min heartbeats), but all Diameter transactions fail; no NAS-level attach accept ever seen.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: GTP-C tries bearer creation but stops after 6 messages; no GTP-U tunnels instantiated, therefore data plane is idle.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No IMS signalling (SIP, RTP) detected; VoLTE effectively unavailable.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Diameter failure blocks attach, which prevents GTP-U setup; user-plane silence is a direct consequence of control-plane rejection.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant UE
    participant eNB
    participant MME
    participant HSS
    UE->>eNB: RRC Connection Request
    eNB->>MME: S1AP Initial UE Message (Attach Request)
    MME->>HSS: Diameter ULR (Cmd-318)
    HSS-->>MME: Diameter ULA Result-Code 2001
    MME-->>eNB: S1AP Downlink NAS: Attach Reject
    eNB-->>UE: RRC Connection Release
    Note over UE,HSS: No GTP-U bearer created, call/data impossible
